en.title: You need to apply for help with your fees
en.line1: You need to apply for help with fees (opens in a new tab) before you continue with this application.
en.line2: Enter the court form number 'D8' when asked. This will be one of the first question when you apply for help with fees (opens in a new tab).
en.line3: After you have applied then you wil receive a Help With Fees reference number. You should enter the reference number when you return to this application.

cy.title: Mae arnoch angen help i dalu eich ffioedd
cy.line1: Mae arnoch angen gwneud cais am help i dalu ffioedd (yn agor mewn tab newydd) cyn i chi barhau gyda’r cais hwn.
cy.line2: Nodwch y rhif ffurflen llys 'D8' pan gofynnir amdano. Dyma fydd un o’r cwestiynau cyntaf pan fyddwch yn gwneud cais am help i dalu ffioedd (yn agor mewn tab newydd).
cy.line3: Ar ôl i chi wneud cais, yna byddwch yn cael cyfeirnod Help i Dalu Ffioedd. Dylech nodi’r cyfeirnod pan fyddwch yn dychwelyd i’r cais hwn.
